["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's International Realty is pleased to offer you this ultra-exclusive three-bedroom apartment for sale in ONE Palm.\xa0The apartment covers an area of 3,540 Sqft with impressive\xa0double-height ceilings\xa0in the living room and master bedroom.\xa0Floor to ceiling glass enables the resident to look out over unforgettable views of the Sea and the exciting Dubai skyline.\xa0This spectacular property features an exquisite, modern and sleek interior design by\xa0award-winning firm Super Potato.
The luxurious amenities available include lush gardens, gym, spa, VIP lounge, private jetty, and cinema. Concierge, chauffeur, housekeeping, 24-hour security, meet & greet are some of the additional services available, operated by 5-star hotel Dorchester. 
One Palm is a limited collection of 90 homes, designed for a life lived in uncompromising abundance, combining a completely reimagined approach to elegance and exclusivity. 
Iconic architecture, sprawling layouts, unbeatable amenities, lush green spaces, and the most sought-after interior features across an exclusive selection of 3 and 4-bedroom apartments, and 5-bedroom penthouses.
Contact us today for your private viewing of this extraordinary project and the selected units available."]

* Resale is permitted upon covering 65% of payment
* No service charges

* The development follows Dubai Development Authority (DDA)

['DescriptionAscot & Co. are proud to present this brand new (never lived in) J-type villa in Mira Oasis 3. It is a middle unit and finished with dark wood. The asking price is 25% less than the cost to buy new making this a fantastic deal.
The property has covered parking for 2 cars and also a separate exit for the maid. Downstairs you have the maid room, laundry to your left. There is under stairs storage and a separate study room with full sliding glass doors. The guest bathroom has a shower so the study could be used as a guest bathroom. You then have the combined living/dining area and on to the kitchen.
Upstairs the property features two balconies, two bathrooms, fitted wardrobes and walk-in closet for the master bedroom.
Call now to arrange a viewing.
